summary: Smart, intelligent and creative. Not an average type. I am an idea generator, a problem solver. Always think outside the box and not afraid of breaking rules to be innovative, to find the best solutions for problems. I have 6 years of experience in application design and development. A self-motivated person with strong analytical. I strive for quality in everything I do and enjoy challenges and achieving goals. I work hard for recognition and aim to be a valuable employee and a great leader. Seeking a challenging, responsible and dynamic position in renowned organization where all my energies, knowledge and experience can be effectively utilized for benefit of the organization and enhancement of my career.
